Title: Buy Back Quiz
Description:
Now that you have completed your purchase, while the engineers at the online streaming company get to work, please complete the following questions. Again, if you can answer four of the five questions correctly, you will be able to enter a lottery.

The lottery has a probability of 1 in 60 winning whatever is left from your purchase.
Note that you can watch the video as many times as you wanted.

questions.name: vid_buy_demo1
questions.title: Where would the highest severe threat be?

questions.name: vid_buy_demo2
questions.title: What is the big stripe of dark blue mentioned in the clip?

questions.name: vid_buy_demo3
questions.title: What will the temperature be in Caribou

questions.name: vid_buy_demo4
questions.title: What is the weather like in Seattle?

questions.name: vid_buy_demo5
questions.title: According to the clip, what is the correct temperature for Pierre

questions.name: Textbox
questions.title: Do you think you bought the right elements? If so, why? If not, what would you have changed?
